fluid.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: He is not allowed solid food yet, only fluids.
fluid.translation[1].definitions[0].defi: a situation that is fluid is likely to change
fluid.translation[1].definitions[1].defi: fluid movements are smooth, relaxed, and graceful
fluid.translation[1].definitions[1].exam: a loose, fluid style of dancing
fluid.translation[1].definitions[2].defi: a fluid substance is a liquid
